title: Bot lane LF clash team
body: My friend and I are looking for a clash team or members to join. We're both gold on the accounts we'll play on but I'm plat on my other acc. I'd strongly prefer adc but my friend can also play mid, but his champ pool is limited to only Vel'Koz and Malz if he's mid.

replies.body: Hi im looking for a team i can play mid/adc or jg
Hi we are a top/jg and a mid main. i have sent you a friend request in game (IGN as displayed). Just hit me up if your interested.
we have a support but we are looking for adc and mid is available add if you are keen
